# append(_:)

**Instance Method**

Suspends until the input is ready for more media data, then appends the timed metadata group.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated(nonsending) func append(_ timedMetadataGroup: AVTimedMetadataGroup) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **timedMetadataGroup**: The timed metadata group to be appended.

## Discussion



## Appending metadata

- **appendImmediately(_:)**: Appends the timed metadata group synchronously if the input is ready for more media data.
- **finish()**: Indicates to the AVAssetWriter that no more buffers will be appended to this receiver.
